name: Sword of the Stars: The Pit - Mind Games
name_original: Sword of the Stars: The Pit - Mind Games
description:
Sword of the Stars: The Pit - Mind Games is an action-RPG game developed by Kerberos Productions. It came out on 03-07-2013. It was published by Kerberos Productions. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Sword of the Stars: The Pit - Mind Games is available on PC.
